mapper.select: select * from tal_product_cate order by cate_code

select * from tal_product
where cate_code = #{cate_code}
and product_name like '%' || #{pagingDto.keyword} || '%'
order by product_name desc
mapper.insert: insert into tal_cart(cart_id, member_id, product_id, product_count) values(seq_cart_id.nextval, #{member_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_count})
insert into tal_order values(seq_order_no.nextval, sysdate, (select distinct member_id from tal_cart where member_id = #{member_id}), 1)

insert into tal_order_detail (order_detail_no, order_product_amount, fk_order_detail_status_code, fk_order_no, fk_product_id) values(seq_order_detail_no.nextval, #{product_count}, 1, (select (max(order_no)) from tal_order),#{product_id})
